attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What can be said about this this arragant self deluded unelected meglamaniac who is willing to sacrifice us all on the altar of his own ambition-just GO NOW Gordon Brown and let us the people try to recover from your ineptitude.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
